mapper.select: select w.* from teacher t,class c,student s,weekly w where t.tid=#{tid} and t.cid=c.cid and c.cid=s.cid and s.sid=w.sid
select s.* from teacher t,class c,student s where t.tid=#{tid} and t.cid=c.cid and c.cid=s.cid
select s.* from sleave sl,teacher t,StudentClass sc,student s where t.tid=#{tid} and t.cid=c.cid and c.cid=s.cid and s.sid=sl.sid
mapper.update: update sleave set state=#{state} where lid=#{lid}
